content:
I dreamed of sitting side by side with friends, watching the Milky Way.
The difference was,
my friends were the stars themselves.

I don't dislike it at all. In fact, it feels quite reliable,
Not just because of Mobai and Sani,
But also because you're here, {me}.

Not every dream is wonderful,
Sometimes nightmares come knocking at random.
But at least... I had a sweet dream last night!

Most of the time, I travel alone.
Having a gathering with Residents like that just now,
it was quite a refreshing experience for me.

Though I'm not too familiar with the proper tea ceremony steps,
I could already catch the ethereal aroma of tea
wafting through the air before the tea party.

"Sweet from the first sip, with a lingering sweetness that rises instantly."
A truly fine tea indeed - it permeates right through to your soul.

I wonder if there's any chrysanthemum tea left,
Adding some honey and chilling it,
Would make it even more delicious~ (imagining)

I never thought I'd see a real Yanmo.
Compared to what's in the documents, (thinking)
the real thing is more terrifying... but also more dreamlike.
I guess I shouldn't judge a book by its cover... or rather, judge a Foam by its cover.
